attributes.action: Make stronger punishments for sexual abuse towards animals.
attributes.additional_details: Many stories like these in the news are very disturbing to me as an animal lover.Every animal has the right to be protected. It isn't just dogs and horses at risk.
attributes.background: Sexual abuse in animals is on the increase.The latest story about a horse called Blaze who was stabbed and sexually abused which resulted in the horse being put to sleep. For years people have been getting away with these crimes. The punishment should be dealt with as if it was a human being abused.
